ゆとり: (ゆとり) - elbowroom; leeway; room; reserve; margin; allowance; latitude; time
ゆとり世代: (ゆとりせだい) - generation of students educated under the "pressure-free" system
ゆとり教育: (ゆとりきょういく) - "education with breathing space" system; pressure-free education
ゆらり: (ゆらり) - swaying (only once, in a large, slow motion); relaxedly
ゆらりゆらり: (ゆらりゆらり) - swaying (repeatedly, in a large, slow motion)
ゆりの木: (ユリノキ) - tulip tree (Liriodendron tulipifera); tuliptree; yellow poplar
ゆり動かす: (ゆりうごかす) - to shake; to wave; to swing; to sway
ゆり落とす: (ゆりおとす) - to shake down (e.g. nuts from a tree)
ゆるしの秘跡: (ゆるしのひせき) - sacrament of penance and reconciliation
ゆるキャラ: (ゆるキャラ) - costumed mascot character (oft. devised for PR purposes by local governments, government departments, etc.)
よ: (よ) - (at sentence-end) indicates certainty, emphasis, contempt, request, etc.; (after a noun) used when calling out to someone; (in mid-sentence) used to catch one's breath or get someone's attention; yo!
よいお年を: (よいおとしを) - Have a good New Year
よいお年をお迎え下さい: (よいおとしをおむかえください) - Have a good New Year
よいしょ: (yoisho) - uf!, iá-iá-iá!, hiá-ho; bajular, puxar saco
よいっしょ: (よいっしょ) - (expression of) effort or strain/Yo-heave-ho!; to butter up/to suck up to
よいとこ取り: (よいとこどり) - focusing on only the good points or strong points; incorporating the benefits (while ignoring the drawbacks); picking the best of both (everything); cherry-picking (e.g. information)
よいと巻け: (よいとまけ) - heave ho (shout used by construction workers, etc. when pulling something big)
よいやよいや: (よんやよんや) - hear! hear!; hooray
よいよい: (よいよい) - locomotor ataxia; difficulty walking or speaking (due to alcoholism, a stroke, etc.); someone with this problem
よい旅を: (よいたびを) - bon voyage!; have a nice trip!
よい旅行を: (よいりょこうを) - "Bon voyage!"; "Have a nice trip!"
よい線: (よいせん) - more or less right; you are on the right track; getting warm
よい頃: (よいころ) - high time; about time
よう: (よう) - (non-五段 verbs, e.g. 食べよう) indicates speculation; indicates will; indicates invitation
ようが: (ようが) - (volitional form of verb + ga) regardless of; whether (or not)
ようさん: (ようさん) - many; a lot; much
ようし: (ようし) - alright; all right; right on; looking good; OK; okay
ようつべ: (ようつべ) - YouTube (Internet video-sharing web site)
ようにする: (ようにする) - (following a verb) to be sure to; to do (something) so that ...; to make sure to; to try to
ように言う: (ようにいう) - to tell (somebody) to (do something)
ようよう: (ようよう) - hullo there!; way to go!; bravo!
よかれと思う: (よかれとおもう) - (often as 良かれと思って) to wish to go well; to have good intentions
よきに計らえ: (よきにはからえ) - take care of it; I'll leave it up to you; do as you see fit
よき人: (よきひと) - person of high rank
よくあるご質問: (よくあるごしつもん) - frequently asked questions; FAQ
よくある事だが: (よくあることだが) - as often is the case
よくある御質問: (よくあるごしつもん) - frequently asked questions; FAQ
よくある質問: (よくあるしつもん) - frequently asked questions; FAQ
よく出来た: (よくできた) - well-balanced; considerate; of fine character
よく学びよく遊べ: (よくまなびよくあそべ) - study hard and play hard
よく言う: (よくいう) - to say enough (as much as required)/to say plenty; to say well/to say cleverly/to say elegantly; to say often/to say frequently; (oft. as an admonition in the form of よく言うよ) to say without shame/to say impudently
よく通る声: (よくとおるこえ) - carrying voice; well-projected voice
よこ糸: (よこいと) - weft; woof (crosswise threads on a loom)
よさこい: (よさこい) - (from 夜さり来い)  dance originating in Kochi Prefecture using "naruko"
よし: (ようし) - alright; all right; right on; looking good; OK; okay
よしなし事: (よしなしごと) - trivial thing; nonsense
よしなに: (yoshinani) - a seu próprio critério, como achar melhor
よじ上る: (よじのぼる) - to climb; to clamber (over, up); to scramble (up); to scale; to claw one's way up
よじ登る: (よじのぼる) - to climb; to clamber (over, up); to scramble (up); to scale; to claw one's way up
よせよ: (よせよ) - for heaven's sake (Pete's, mercy's, etc.); for pity's sake; oh stop; lay off
よそ行き: (よそいき) - going out; one's best (clothes, looks, manners, behaviour, etc.); formal behaviour (manners, speech, etc.)
よたよた: (よたよた) - unsteadily; waddling; staggeringly; totteringly
よだれを出す: (よだれをだす) - to drool; to salivate
よだれを垂らす: (よだれをたらす) - to drool; to dribble; to slobber
よちよち: (よちよち) - totteringly; with tottering steps
よちよち歩き: (よちよちあるき) - toddling; taking tottering steps
よっこいしょ: (よっこいしょ) - (expression of) effort or strain; heave-ho
よっこらしょ: (よっこらしょ) - heigh-hoh; heave-ho; alley oop; (expression of) effort or strain
よっしゃ: (ヨッシャー) - gotcha; alrighty; got it; OK
よっしゃー: (ヨッシャー) - gotcha; alrighty; got it; OK
よって来たる: (よってきたる) - originating; causing; beginning
よって来る: (よってきたる) - originating; causing; beginning
よね: (よね) - (compound particle used at sentence-end) ...isn't that right?
よぼよぼ: (よぼよぼ) - unsteady/tottering; weak from old age/infirm
よもやま話: (よもやまばなし) - talk about various topics
より: (より) - than; from/out of/since/at/on; except/but/other than; more
よりによって今日: (よりによってきょう) - today of all days
よりも: (よりも) - (emphatic form of より)  in comparison to; rather than
よりを戻す: (よりをもどす) - to get back together again; to be reconciled
より一層: (よりいっそう) - still more/even more/much more/all the more/further; increased/greater
より大きい: (よりおおきい) - (e.g. 〜より大きい) greater than ...; (e.g. より大きい〜) bigger ...
より対線: (よりついせん) - twisted pair cable
より小さい: (よりちいさい) - (e.g. 〜より小さい) less than ...; (e.g. より小さい〜) smaller ...
より所: (よりどころ) - grounds/foundation/authority; support/prop/something upon which to rely
より糸: (よりいと) - twisting (thread, etc.); twisted yarn; twisted thread; twine
よる: (よる) - (after the -masu stem of a verb) verb suffix indicating contempt or disdain for another's action
よれよれ: (よれよれ) - worn-out; shabby; seedy; wrinkled-up
よろしくお願いいたします: (よろしくおねがいいたします) - please remember me; please help me; please treat me well
よろしくお願いします: (よろしくおねがいします) - please remember me; please help me; please treat me well; I look forward to working with you
よろぴく: (よろぴく) - (variant of よろしく) well/properly/suitably; best regards/please remember me
よんやよんや: (よんやよんや) - hear! hear!; hooray
よーし: (ようし) - alright; all right; right on; looking good; OK; okay
らか: (らか) - (after an adjective stem, onomatopoeic-mimetic word, etc.) being ...
